1.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: A trainer stops them for their first ever battle!
A wild Pokemon stops them! Time to test her catching skills!
Nothing as they reach the city! Time to explore!
They pass by a cam...No Rose! Don't eat their food! That's criminal!!
Stumbled upon some people wearing weird get-ups...oh uh.
1.content:
C'mon Rose! The next town is only..." An overly preppy voice cheered, the owner is a young girl with fluffy hair white as sunshine. Her innate...greenness was painfully obvious as the way she looked at her town map. Her forehead practically touching the damn thing's screen. Sort mint colored eyes squinting at the screen's map, quietly murmuring to herself. Her lips curling upwards. "....A half-mile away!"

"DeinDeiDi....DeinDei!" Her companion, a young Deino dully grumbled. Cursing in her strange terminology. Easily finding her trainer's....optimism to be worse than smelling a Koffing...on a hot summer day.

"Jeez Rose, don't be such a potty mouth. You ruined those pretty little fangs!" The young girl teased only first and only Pokemon. Causing the creature to hiss up a storm. Which the girl only giggled in response. This became an odd sort of bonding ritual between the two. It all started ever since she threw a premier ball at her while she was napping on her parents' estate. Becoming her first-ever Pokemon! And the grumpy little dragon now stops chewing on her poor bottom in three minutes flat, which is showing real promise on their blossoming relationship!

Much to said pokemon's chagrin.

That...and she technically....ran away from home. And used her beloved father's money to get a trainer's license for herself. But alas, her adventurous wanderlust can not be tamed! But she did write a note to her loving parents. Surely they will understand her predicament!

As the sun shines in the sky, and bird Pokemon flutter about. What trouble decides to come to greet our illustrious duo?
1.title: This...is going to end badly...I just know it.

11.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: A relaxed girl...who is wearing a strange red hat
A dark skinned girl with wild purple hair. She looks cockey
A cute looking short boy with short orange hair
Someone else, perhaps some more "generic" trainers?
11.content:
"Hey you!" A voice cuts to them both. Stopping both of them in their tracks. The sunlight only made their body a vague silhouette! They couldn't make it who they are!

"When a trainer's eyes meets, a battle will surely start...."

"DeiDeinoDein?" Rose sighed as she turned to her trainer who is positively shaking with joy. Swear to Acreus, she can jump around the world twelve times with the amount of energy she is putting out. The shadow stepped closer and reveals...

(Author note: Any character in Abby's age range will be just starting out their journeys as well. To make it a little bit fairer on poor Abby...the girl needs it.)
11.title: This will be good...

choices: Abigail starts to tease Trevor, throwing him off
The battle begins
Something interrupts their battle
113.content:
"Um... hello there." An orange-haired boy says as he steps out of the shadows. "I was simply going to ask if you would let me scan your Deino for my pokedex. I'm on a journey to complete the pokedex for Professor Sycamore, and it would be great if I could get data on a Deino so soon in my journey."

"Yeah, sure, whatever. You can scan it. But first, you gotta battle me for it." Abby explains. "I'm too excited to not battle now."

"Uhh... okay. I'm not much of a battler, but I'll try. My name's Trevor, by the way." The boy says.

"I'm Abigail, and this is my partner Rose." The girl says motioning to her pokemon. "Now come on, get your pokemon out and lets battle already."

"V-very well then." Trevor stutters as he pulls out his pokeball. "Come out Flabébe." He says as he sends out the tiny flower pokemon.

"Nawww. She sooo cute." Abigail coos. "Alright then, here's how this is gonna go. One on one, no subs, first to faint loses, etc. etc. If I lose then you get to scan Rose for your pokedex. But if I win, then you have to do whatever I say. Deal?"

"Wait, wha...?" Trevor starts to ask in confusion.

"Great. Okay then, let's battle." Abigail cuts off as she and Rose getting into ready position, forcing Trevor to do the same.

What happens next?
113.title: Meeting Trevor

choices: Ralts
Snorunt
Buneary
Smoochum
Another Pokemon
12.content:
"Come on Rose. I've got a good feeling that things are going to get better for us." Abigail cheered as she marched on.

Deiein. The creature whined as she trotted along behind her. As fun as this girl could be, she needed someone else to come along soon to buffer some of that energy away from her. A trainer, a boyfriend, hell, even another pokemon would be nice just to get some of this excess enthusiasm off of her.

Just then, a rustling came from some nearby bushes ahead of them, stopping the two in their tracks. "Heads up Rose, looks like we're about to encounter another pokemon. I can't wait. Whatever it is, I'm gonna catch it, then I'll be that much closer to the Pokemon League." She monologues.

Rose walked ahead of her and stood in battle position. Looks like her wish was gonna come true. Another pokemon for her partner to dote on. She had to win this battle, no matter what.

What pokemon leaps out?
12.title: A Potential Recruit

choices: She jumps into Abby's arms, ready to go
She doesn't want to go, time for a battle
Before it can respond, a mother Gardevoir comes around looking for its child
121.content:
Ralts? The tiny pokemon squeaks as it comes out of the bushes and onto the road where the girl and her pokemon stood and watched.

"Nawww. It's so adorable." Abigail cooed as her eyes turned to hearts at the sight of the little thing. "Let's see here..." She says as she pulls out her pokedex.

"Ralts, the feeling pokemon. Ralts can sense the feelings of people and pokemon and can tell if they have a positive disposition. They hide if they sense any hostility." She reads off the entry. "Dawwww. Even your pokedex entry is adorable."

Rose rolled her eyes a bit at her trainer's behavior as she walked up and knelt down before it. "So what do you say, little cutie. Since you're not running away you must be able to tell I'm not hostile. Wanna come along on a journey with me?" Abby asks with a toothy grin down at the small bowl-cutted pokemon.

How does Ralts respond?
121.title: Ralts

13.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: "...ETERNA CITY."
"...SANTALUNE CITY."
"....HEAHEA CITY."
...VIRBANK CITY"
Some other cities perhaps?
13.content:
Luckily just as the Deino inched closer to her trainer's innocent ass with numerous fangs ready to deal punishment. They luckily came upon the entrance of a city. Leaving the angsty dragon to only chomp on dust as her trainer sprinted like a highly trained rapidash.

"DEIN DEI!" The little dragon yelled at the running dummy, waddling her little legs after her. Nipping on the ankles of anyone who dared to get in her way! As she catches up with her dumb-dumb of a trainer, they pass a sign of that said "WELCOME TO...
13.title: I feel like this is how most missing cases starts

choices: Saffron City
Olivine City
Another City
135.title: Some other cities perhaps?

choices: Sabrina's too strong and Abigail's too weak. It's not even a fight
Sabrina takes pity on the girl and throws the match
Rose... puts up a fight?!
1351.content:
As Abigail ran into town, she quickly realized she had no idea where she actually was. "Oh shoot." She says aloud as she stops, letting Rose catch up, gasping for air as she flopped down on her belly. "I was so excited that I completely forgot to check where we are."

If Rose had the strength right now, she would chomp down on her trainer's rear end as hard as she could and refuse to let go."Let's see..." She says, checking the town on the map for a name. "Says here we're in... Saffron City. And if I just tap around for a few more details, it looks like this place has a gym after all. We're in luck!" She cheers, much to her pokemon's annoyance.

"Here we go. Gym leader name... Sabrina. Specializes in... psychic types. And if what I learned in pokemon school is right, my cutie wootie Rose is part dark type, and dark is completely immune to psychic types. That means we basically win by default." She cheers some more.

Rose could barely even open her mouth to object before she was scooped up in the girl's arms. "Come on, let's go find that gym and win our first badge." She says before running off.

*****

After some searching and a lot of getting lost, Abigail finally finds herself standing before the Saffron Gym. "Here we go Rose. Our first gym battle." She says before walking right in.

DeinDei. Rose tries to oppose, having finally regained the energy to talk.

"Don't worry, we'll be fine." Abigail reassures. "It's a surefire win thanks to the type advantage we have."

"Oh really?" They both hear said as they walk into an unlit room. The lights snap on to reveal a battle arena, and on the other side was a blue-haired woman in a purple crop top and white pants. "And who exactly are you to make such a declaration?" The woman asks.

"Uhhh... I'm Abigail, and this is Rose, and we're here to beat you for a badge." The young girl declares with a mix of confidence and nervousness.

"Alright then. We'll see about that. I am Sabrina, leader of this gym, and I accept your challenge. How many pokemon do you have?" Sabrina asks.

"Uhh... just Rose, actually." She admits.

"Just one? This will hardly be a battle then. Very well, then I shall also use one pokemon." Sabrina resigns. "But be aware, given the special case of this match, there will be an added rule."

"What rule is that?" Abigail asks as she sets Rose on the floor.

"If I win this match, then you are to do whatever I say until sundown." The psychic reveals.

"That sounds a bit... intense for a first-timer. But I won't let that stop me, you're on." She declares despite her partner's protests.

"Very well then. Abra, I choose you." Sabrina starts off as she calls out her pokemon. "Let the battle begin."
1351.title: A Favorable Match?

13511.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: Sabrina wants to relax after all that. And in comes poor Abby
Abby gets a big wake call, and does some hard labor (Gts)
Something else?
13511.content:
Despite her initial protests, Rose came charging in like a crazed Bouffalant. Causing Abby to smile, slowly becoming more confident in the little dragon's bravado. Even Sabrina was a little impressive by her attitude.

But it still wasn't enough. Not by a long shot.

Despite being armed with the moves Dragon rage and Bite, both would have instantly landed an easy victory against any Abra. But Sabrina's own was slippery as a greased Tynamo. Using teleport to safely darted away from the blue flames. Making the little creature all the angrier.

"Darn it....Rose chase it around and use bite whenever you get close!" Abigail cheered in support, making Rose see a different side of the idiot child. There was a certain spark in her eyes. And for once, the dragon fiercely replied to her trainer's order. A maw filled with fangs came charging in like an eager liepard going for the kill!....only to miss the target, no thanks to the visual problems that plagued the first two stages of her kind. The abra wasted no time unleashing a bright light that did wonders for said visual problems. This quickly becomes a cycle as the dragon stubbornly insists. Until she comes to stop, panting angrily as it was clear as day that she lost the battle. Her former foe didn't even break an ounce of sweat.

The dragon couldn't continue even if she wanted to. So a dejected Abby returned her back into her pretty white Pokeball. The saddened girl was about to walk to the nearest Pokecenter. Until the cool stern voice of Sabrina cuts her own sadness like a knife through butter.

"Stop your sulking and come here." Abigail got a chill ran down her spine as she approached the woman. Her eyes immediately widened at the woman's tall height. Red eyes soullessly gazing her body. Making her eyes averted to her body. Noticing the way her slim body made curves despite having a smaller bust and thinner legs. Her cheeks turned red as she shamefully looks down on the floor. Sabrina didn't seem to notice as she continued to speak.

"Did you honestly think that just because your Pokemon is part dark type that it will be such an easy victory? To point you clearly came extremely unprepared?" Sabrina coldly toned, clearly very angry at the girl's utter arrogance and lack of responsibility. "What if you were alone in a forest and Rose just fainted? Being a Pokemon trainer isn't a damn game where nothing bad happens! Pokemon depends on us and vice versa. They are not little trophies of your vanity."

Sabrina's harsh words made her body shivered like she was stranded in a blizzard with only a mere summer dress for protection. Her eyes grew watery and her bottom lip quivered as she sniffed. Causing the normally ever stoic Sabrina's scowl to soften.

"…But despite being an idiot who is in way over her head, you do actually care and love about your Pokemon. And that more than what other people can say."

Hearing that made Abby's heart fluttered like butterfree emerging from night long slumber. Her frown slowly turning up-

"But utter stupidity and naivety like yours must be dealt with immediately. And I'm certainly have nothing better to do at the current moment."

And like that, the butterfree gotten eaten by a cruel honchkrow. It didn't stand a singular once of a chance. All poor Abby could say is " Ehhh!"


As the plot thickens, what happens next?
13511.title: And this is Sabrina being nice

choices: Abigail kisses her foot out of nowhere
Sabrina relaxes and enjoys a bit before giving the next job
Something else
135111.content:
"As I'm sure you recall, the deal was that I fight with one pokemon, and if you lost you had to do whatever it said until sunset. It's noon now, so you have a long day ahead of you. I plan to relax for the rest of the day, and your going to help me." The psychic tells the girl.

"Help you... how exactly?" Abigail asks nervously.

"Well, let's start with something simple." Sabrina says as she motions her former challenger further into the gym. Abigail followed on shaky legs as Sabrina kicked off her shoes and stretched out her legs. "Start with a simple foot rub."

Abigail sweat a bit as she blushed at the thought of rubbing this girl's feet for her. It was embarrassing, but a deal was a deal. She knelt down and began to rub her socked feet, only for Sabrina to stop her. "No no no. Take off my socks first." She orders.

"R-right." Abigal stutters as she grabs the lips of her socks and slowly removes them, unveiling two slender, dainty feet tipped with black-painted toenails. The soles had a slight pink hue to them, presumably from all the work she's done today.

"Better. Now you can rub." Sabrina confirms. With her permission, Abigail begins to press her fingers along the bare flesh, making Sabrina sigh and coo as she felt the stress leave her feet, while Abigail was begining to feel hot and bothered right now.

What happens next?
135111.title: Sabrina's Relaxation

14.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: An older pink haired girl. She looks so angry that she is crying!
An concerned older woman wearing...fangs? She doesn't look mad
An girl wearing a patchwork dress? She is giggling to herself?
Someone else?
14.content:
The two pass by a rather standard looking campsite near a forest. The camp-owner was very responsible as there was no litter and trash scattered about. Abigail only shrugged as continued her merry little way. But only to stop completely as the usual his sing and growling her companion makes almost daily now comes to a crashing halt. Her eyes shifted around, only to find her Pokemon going to the campsite! Drool dripping from her smiling bottom lip!

"Stop Rose!" Abby nearly tripped as she chased after the little glutton. Her thin arms wrapping around the little dragon who is chomping some berries stored in the tent. Who knew such a little thing will be so strong!?! Rose didn't help matters as she thrashes about, causing the tent to fall apart. The thrashes stops as both hear footstep. Abigail peeked her head out of the mess that once was a tent and saw...
14.title: Get your fucking Dragon!

141.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
choices: Abby is ordered to give the girl a massage, for all the pain and trauma!
Rose angrily barks at the girl, challenging her to a fight!
Both of them cut their losses and run...which makes the girl madder.
141.content:
"My t-tent...my poor tent!" Came the shrill shriek of the apparent owner of the pile of fabric and metal that was once a respectable tent. Out came an older girl with pink pigtails. With trendy shades over her eyes, a pink bra with red hearts that showcase her average-sized breasts. And finally blue denim shorts that showed..um...how should I say this..how..full her thighs are compared to the rest of her body.

The older girl pointed her expertly manicured ring finger at the duo, streams of tears running down her cheeks as...she just whined in babbled up words. Her crimson wedges stamped the ground like an angry Taurous. Causing both Pokemon and girl blank look at each other and at the girl. They are both too dumbfounded on what to do next.

After what seems to be a solid half-hour of immature whining and shocked awkwardness. The girl with no name clamped her knees, she made herself all gross and sweaty in her perfectly normal show of maturity. Her cheeks was flushed with her skin dripping with droplets of sweat. The other party just look back at each other, both not sure on what to do now...

What does happen next in this thrilling drama?
141.title: Not enough crying, 1/5- IGN

choices: My back
My feet
Somewhere else
1411.content:
"Listen up you... yoouuuu..." The pink haired girl forces out in her anger before composing herself enough to speak properly. "Here's how this is gonna go. It took a long time to set that tent up that you wrecked. So now that you tore it down, I only see it as fair that I be compensated."

"Okay, we're sorry. We'll help put up the tent and be on our way." Abby tells the pinkette while she fights her way out of the collapsed tent.

"Not a chance. You'll be fixing my tent, of course, to make us even. But I said I wanted to be compensated for it." She whined. "On top of fixing my tent, you, little brat, will be giving me a full body massage."

"Oh yeah? And why would I do that?" Abby snapped back. "What's stopping me and Rose from just up and leaving?"

"Because if you do, my Miltank will flatten you like pancakes before you could even get over the horizon." The girl threatened.

"Oh yeah, like we're supposed to be scared of some Miltank." Abby says with an eye roll and heavy amounts of sarcasm. "What makes yours so special that we should be worried?"

"Perhaps you haven't heard of me? I am Goldenrod City's very own gym leader, Whitney. Trainers far and wide shudder at the thought of me and my sweet Miltank." Whitney boasts as she finally announces herself.

Abby paled when she finally revealed her identity. She'd heard horror stories of this girl from trainers who could never beat her. They spoke of her Miltank like it was a demon in pokemon form. She never knew that this was what she looked like, especially not looking so... filled-out!

"Really?! You're Whitney? Well why didn't you say so? Of course I'll massage you." Abby says, giving a complete 180 on her attitude towards the girl.

"That's better. Now recall that dragon so you can start with rubbing..."
1411.title: Abby's Massage Order

info.author_name: P O S T  B O Y
info.brief_description: Can you help Abigail be the very best across the land?
info.description:
Welcome to yet another story of mine! This is a mix of dating sim, a visual novel, and the timeless story of a kid traveling around the place to place. Making friends with fuck powerful forces of nature. Only...more raunchy. ;)

Here are da rulz!

1. No short chapters! Keep a minimum of two to four paragraphs at a minimum. I will give leniency on some chapters but don't continuously make them

3. Sexual content will be heavily referenced and will happen. And actual super "lewd" stuff may or not transpire in later chapters. But being constantly naked is which is a no-no.
3.1. Super young characters (like Bonnie) will have no hardcore and mild level lewd chapters about them whatsoever. Light will be welcome…but it keep that way.
3.2. Full-blown sex and actual romance will be something will you have to develop a relationship with a character. none of which will be the super young characters. Crushes can be formed quite easily however and can act as a starting point for it.

4. No toilet, TG, Tf, Most of Weight gain, major limb expansion or inflation, or vore of any kind. That goes for any kink that goes against the flow of the story. I will allow some shrinking/growing, and maybe other stuff like that.
4.1 But it has to be done by a Pokemon or a human with special powers like Sabrina. And must be reversible.

5. My eternal rule: Not every foot have to smell like a cheese factory, nor do they smell like a field of daisies. The same goes for the feet' size and texture. Not every person is tall or is short for that matter. Not every girl has watermelon for tits. Or an ass that claps away thunderstorms. Variety is the spice of life, get what I'm saying. All too make feel a little more realistic and "human". But it doesn't mean that characters that normally don't have stinky feet can't have positively barking dogs and same for goes vice versa.

6 Your choices do matter in the long run and shape the main character's personality and also develop the others. And remember while you are free to do whatever you want. But remember, you aren't free from the consequences of said actions.
6.1. The protagonist is a deeply sheltered but sweet girl who is so naive and carefree that it hurts, has not mentioned she is at the age where she starts to look at things differently…and realize new distinct ways about herself. So of which are quite pervy…Nuff said.
6.2. Her age would...be vague. All I would say that she will be somewhere between being eleven and fifteen years old. What her exact age can definitely be confirmed in a storyline.

7. Please keep the influx of choice chapters on the relatively low.

8. Keep it, first person or second person.

9. No sudden abrupt endings and deaths. The former can be done in matter of....thirty chapters in. Deaths are a strong maybe.

10. Make all characters act their age and true to their personalities. But interpretations and exploration on them and how they react to things are not only allowed but is ENCOURAGED. Not to mention…it's kinda one of the main themes of the story.
10.1. That being...they are allowed to cuss like sailors. Everyone except for Abby and Lillie who will use super grown-up substitutions like (heck, darnit, poop, and etc.)

11. And while foot fetish is what you called the "main" kink of this story and will be encouraged. It doesn't mean that Abigail(the name of our protagonist) is blind to a character's other "assets" *eyebrow wiggle*. But be warned, this isn't pure smut(and it can be kinda close). But playful mocking, outright bullying, and teasing is very much allowed and is encouraged. ;D

12. And while I'm straight. You can play and interact with both boy and girl characters. Although I would like more stuff focusing on girls. But no chapters with the character lewd interaction being adult and older males (Like Hala and Giovanni.)

13. While the Humans are the main focus of the story, Pokemon themselves play a lesser but still major role of in it. And certain ones may be interacted in a certain way! Abby may have strange experiences against some wild Froslass she happen to find in her journey of becoming the best and strongest trainer ever! Or her very own Steelie may find new games to play with her dritz of a trainer.…or a rival trainer might use their own Delphox to dish out some cruel and unusual penalties. But despite these, humans are still the frontrunners
13.1 Some Pokemon will be pushed for these interacts (CoughGardeviourCough)…others not so much (looks at Muk)

12. The specific region Abby is in will be determined either by a specific character, the criminal team she encounters or a city/location she enters.

13. The most important rule…is to have fun, and get creative with it!

12. Second most important rule; no crossovers! Keep it purely Pokemon!

THE WANTED LIST; I will offer up to five hundred to a thousand gift points on 1,600 to 3,200 gift points for any chapters these characters:

1. Iris ( Unova)

2. Gardenia (Sinnoh)

3. Flannery (Hoenn)

4. Whitney (Johto)

5. Lana (Aloha)

6. Bea (Galar)

7. Serena (Kalos)

8. Plumeria (Aloha)

9. Marenie (Galar)

10. Pokemon trainer type: Lass (Depending on the model you use, it will determine the region Abby is in)

ITS GOOD TO BE BAD! THIS MONTH WILL FOCUS ON : Team Skull

Sipping Tea, Any chapters on any of the trainers of Galar, will get a hefty bonus of four thousand points!
